biography.place-of-birth: Crest Hill, Bristol Township; Gotham County

work.base: Batcave, Stately Wayne Manor, Gotham City; Hall of Justice, Justice League Watchtower

connections.group-affiliation: Batman Family, Batman Incorporated, Justice League, Outsiders, Wayne Enterprises, Club of Heroes, formerly White Lantern Corps, Sinestro Corps
connections.relatives: Damian Wayne (son), Dick Grayson (adopted son), Tim Drake (adopted son), Jason Todd (adopted son), Cassandra Cain (adopted ward), Martha Wayne (mother, deceased)

aliases: The guardian of the eastern dark

work.occupation: Protector of the jungle and nearby tribes

connections.group-affiliation: The Phantom leagacy (21 generations of Phantoms), Jungle patrol
connections.relatives: Kit Walker Sr. (father, deceased), Diana Palmer-Walker (wife), Kit Jr. and Heloise Walker (children)
